resources.string:
Hi, my name is Mireya Hernandez-Cruz. 

Creating this application has been fun. 

I am currently a Junior at Florida Gulf Coast University majoring in Software Engineering. 

I am a Front Desk Assistant for the Housing and Residence Life at FGCU. 

I am also apart of clubs such as the Software Engineering Club, 

Society of Hispanic Engineers, Eagle Gather and Osprey Area Council. 

Fun Facts 
I am fluent in three languages. I love both cats and dogs. 

 I am currently in search of a Summer internship in Florida!
